title: Lightnin' Hopkins - 1990 - Blues In My Bottle, Walkin This Road
description:
Lightnin' Hopkins - 1990 - Blues In My Bottle, Walkin This Road By Myself

Almost 2 for 1 on this CD of Lightnin' Hopkins 1961-62 recordings for Prestige records Bluesville label, with 'Death Bells' dropped from the Blues In My Bottle album for space reasons. Two sides of Hopkins are featured here with Billy Bizer, Spider Kilpatrick and Buster Pickens ironically accompanying on the Walkin' This Road By Myself cuts and Hopkins and his guitar doing the business on the Blues In The Bottle' sides. There are more of Hopkins eccentric lyrics on 'Happy Blues For John Glenn', written directly after the first American space flight and 'The Devil Jumped The Black Man'. A bumper package of some the finest examples of Lightnin' Hopkins' Texas blues.
